summary: Build a simplified FinTrack finance manager using Internet Computerâ€“compatible stack (Motoko backend + React/TypeScript frontend) with in-app features: transactions CRUD, categories and auto-categorization rules, budgets with in-app alerts, savings goals, and basic analytics/charts.
architectural_notes: Target platform: Internet Computer (Motoko backend canister + React/TypeScript frontend)
Auth via Internet Identity; no JWT/bcrypt
Data stored in canister storage (no MongoDB/Atlas)
Notifications limited to in-app alerts (no email/SMS/Twilio/Nodemailer)

existing_features.title: Implement Internet Identity login on the frontend and use the authenticated principal as the user identity for all finance data operations.
Build Transactions module UI and backend API for add/edit/delete transactions and listing with basic filtering/sorting.
Build Categories module UI and backend API to create/rename/delete categories and assign categories to transactions.
Implement rule-based auto-categorization: allow users to define rules (e.g., keyword match on description/merchant) that automatically assign a category on transaction creation/import within the app.
Build Budgets module: allow users to define budgets (e.g., per category and/or overall) for a time period (monthly minimum) and compute budget utilization from transactions.
Implement in-app budget alerts: generate and display alert items when utilization crosses configurable thresholds (e.g., 80%, 100%), with read/dismiss state stored per user.
Build Savings Goals module: create/update/delete goals with target amount and optional target date; track progress using linked contributions (manual entries) and/or computed from transactions.
Create Analytics dashboard with basic charts and summaries for spending/income, category breakdown, budget utilization, and savings goal progress.
Add core navigation and information architecture for the app: Dashboard, Transactions, Categories/Rules, Budgets/Alerts, Savings Goals, and Settings (at minimum for account/sign-out).
Apply a coherent, distinct visual theme across the React app (colors, typography, spacing, components) suitable for a personal finance tracker, avoiding blue/purple as primary brand colors.

new_feature_requests.summary: Set up FinTrack simplified app on Internet Computer (Motoko backend canister + React/TypeScript frontend) with Internet Identity auth and canister storage
Transactions module: add/edit/delete transactions with basic fields and listing/filtering UI
Categories module with auto-categorization rules (rule-based learned rules supported within app constraints)
Budgets module with in-app alerts/notifications (no email/SMS)
Basic analytics and charts dashboard for spending/budgets/goals
Create backend canister data models and stable storage for: Transactions, Categories, Auto-categorization Rules, Budgets, Budget Alerts (in-app), and Savings Goals, all scoped per user principal.
